item.description: […] The Challenges are challenges of imagination and conceptualization which are cultural and anti-ethical and mutually exclusive from a Capitalist mode of production. Our current system of Political Economy is a Debt based system revolving around maintaining monopoly power based on an assumption of Scarcity and following from that the need for security authority and if needs be, coercion. http://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.se/2016/08/neo-liberalism-billy-no-mates-or-just.html […]
